title: Sofia Vergara makes it a priority to model her $27 jeans from Walmart
text:
She is TV's highest-paid actress with a salary of $42.5 million from 2018 alone for her role on Modern Family.

But despite Sofia Vergara's riches she opted to rock a casual outfit on Wednesday that retailed for a total of just $37.50.

The 47-year-old beauty was makeup-free and spotted in West Hollywood ahead of a treatment at a skincare clinic.

Regular like anyone else: Sofía Vergara was spotted out and about West Hollywood makeup free on Wednesday morning wearing a $37.50 outfit from her clothing line

Sofia stunned in a white Evil Eye crew-neck T-shirt from her brand, Sofia Jeans by Sofia Vergara.

The shirt is stocked at Walmart and retails for $15.50 - but is currently on sale for just $9.99.

She teamed the look with a pair of cropped jeans also from her line that had distresses and cuts throughout the leg. The trim boyfriend pair are priced at just $27.50.

Affordable for all: The shirt is stocked at Walmart and retails for $15.50 - but is currently on sale for just $9.99

Top of her game: She's TV's highest paid actress on $42.5 million in just 2018

Sofia added to her 5ft7 stature with a pair of strappy peep-toe platform heels.

The Fading Gigolo actress styled her long voluminous brunette hair into waves and appeared to be makeup free for the skincare visit.

The Colombia native's role on the show has made her the highest paid TV actress for the past seven years.

On set: Here the beauty is seen with Ed O'Neill on Modern Family

One more season: The final season of Modern Family runs through summer 2020. Season 10 in 2019 was initially scheduled to be the last in the series but was brought back for one more due to popular demand (pictured season 1 in 2009)

Sofia banked $42.5 million between June 2017 and June 2018 - 73% more than second-ranked Kaley Cuoco's $24.5 million.

The final season of Modern Family runs through summer 2020.

Season 10 in 2019 was initially scheduled to be the last in the series but was brought back for one more due to popular demand.
description: Sofía Vergara was spotted out and about West Hollywood makeup free on Wednesday morning wearing a $37.50 outfit from her clothing line.
